title: Should PROJECT: Yasuo cost 975rp?
body:
As we all know, 5 new project skins are coming out, all of which cost the same as project yasuo {{champion:157}} except for Yi`s which has more and costs more. However my problem is that the new project skins outclass the project yasuo skin. They are more and better.

Should the PROJECT:Yasuo skin now cost 975rp?

replies.body:
Hey KikiTheDestroyer! 

Just wanted to hop in with a comparison of PROJECT: Yasuo versus the new PROJECT: skins coming out! 

PROJECT: Yasuo has all of the same content as the upcoming PROJECT: skins, which include 

* New model and textures
* New particle effects
* New sound effects
* Voice processing
* New animations, including recall animation

PROJECT: Yi has all of the above, as well as an entirely new VO script. 

In your opinion, what makes the new PROJECT: skins better than PROJECT: Yasuo?

when you put it that way looks like they are the same...

my feelings probably steem from the sexy white plating the new skins have, it looks 2 damn cool.

Maybe because the 5 PROJECT skins are new and Yasuo was already there. I think if the 5 were here before Yasuo and PROJECT: Yasuo would have been teased instead of the five, then people might say PROJECT: Yasuo outclasses the others.

Btw..Katey...
I dont need an reaction to what i will say now but, i just want you to read that atleast.
Please dont make the first post-rework sion skin 750 RP Tier. Receiving a 750RP Skin after 4 years without a skin is neck breaking.

project yasuo was 975 rp when it was released bc it was on sale like with most skins on release  they are probably going to make him on sale when the new project skins come out i think there gonna make PROJECT fiora leona and yasuo 975rp when they release the skins

Not really.
Project: Yasuo has particle effects, a new voiceover(barely, they just splashed techno all over it, but still any excuse to make it 1350 right xD), and obviously a new look. All of which are needed for a 1350 skin.
Technically its not a new Voice over its a voice filtering/processing

> [{quoted}](name=Neamean,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AsyMpnEg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-24T17:02:34.334+0000)
>
> Technically its not a new Voice over its a voice filtering/processing

Yeah but, its still considered a new VO... for some reason... Idk why. Lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AsyMpnEg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-24T17:21:21.677+0000)
>
> Hey KikiTheDestroyer! 
> 
> Just wanted to hop in with a comparison of PROJECT: Yasuo versus the new PROJECT: skins coming out! 
> 
> PROJECT: Yasuo has all of the same content as the upcoming PROJECT: skins, which include 
> 
> * New model and textures
> * New particle effects
> * New sound effects
> * Voice processing
> * New animations, including recall animation
> 
> PROJECT: Yi has all of the above, as well as an entirely new VO script. 
> 
> In your opinion, what makes the new PROJECT: skins better than PROJECT: Yasuo?



Even Riot say it "voice processing"

> [{quoted}](name=Neamean,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AsyMpnEg,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-24T17:47:57.375+0000)
>
> Even Riot say it "voice processing"

True, but I'm pretty sure it counts as a whole voice-over.

A whole voice-over makes a skin 1820, like PROJECT: Yi, Forecast Janna, Omega Squad Teemo.

A whole voice-over gives a skin completely new lines.

> [{quoted}](name=RedStarLights,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AsyMpnEg,comment-id=000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-08-27T05:21:37.827+0000)
>
> A whole voice-over makes a skin 1820, like PROJECT: Yi, Forecast Janna, Omega Squad Teemo.
> 
> A whole voice-over gives a skin completely new lines.

Huh, thought it was considered a new voice-over just because the audio was replaced.
The audio just gets filtered/processed, not replaced.

> [{quoted}](name=RedStarLights,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AsyMpnEg,comment-id=00010000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-28T19:52:13.823+0000)
>
> The audio just gets filtered/processed, not replaced.

Not even the audio files?
I guess it just comes down to what we consider is a voice over and my opinion differ from yours and that okay.

They don't outclass him at all.

His animations and all that are still top-notch and he's the second best project skin next to Zeds. The other project skins are all very mediocre especially Yi's.

Project Zed
Project Yasuo
Project lucian
Project leona
Project Yi
Project Fiora
personally i think lucian is the best project skin then zed and yas

> [{quoted}](name=SwapShadows,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AsyMpnEg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-24T13:22:51.594+0000)
>
> They don't outclass him at all.
> 
> His animations and all that are still top-notch and he's the second best project skin next to Zeds. The other project skins are all very mediocre especially Yi's.

Well, that's a matter of opinion. My personal favorite is Yi's, then Fiora's, Leona's, Lucian's, and then Zed's. I personally don't like Zed's skin but you do so, y'kno, opinion.
